author: andreas
content:
Hmm ... if it were exceptionally cold, I'd probably like it much more. No, it is just unexceptionally mediocre, with temperatures never as low as to keep the snow stable, always hovering around freezing, just perpetuating the slush ðŸ™‚

My memory may play tricks with me, but I remember the last winter was much better. But then, it's all a matter of how you cope with it. I guess it's easy to find something wrong with the most pleasant of situations. Negativity is in the mind ðŸ˜„
